task.summary: Create LoanController and LoanControllerTest using TDD to resolve all possible issues from the start. Add some correction to the LoanDTO and using new dependency I provide @Suite to run all my tests at the same moment right before every commit.

Create test suites for Accounts and Cards microservices.
Add JUnit suite dependency to the pom.xml files. So that allowed us to implement TestSuites to run all needed tests in one click

Update config server and microservices to support instant updates of config files connected through GitHub. Here are implemented 2 ways: 1. Use actuator/refresh endpoint for each microservice 2. Use actuator/busrefresh endpoint that uses RabbitMQ to update all the configurations at once.

Update config server and microservices to support instant updates of config files connected through GitHub. Here are implemented 2 ways: 1. Use actuator/refresh endpoint for each microservice 2. Use actuator/busrefresh endpoint that uses RabbitMQ to update all the configurations at once.

Add dependency to the config server to support /monitor endpoint that will be invoked after every push to the repo of configurations. So after each push configurations on config server will be refreshed.
Edit Docker Compose files to use different profiles. Also, make sure microservices don't start while other required services are down or unhealthy.
Correct some obvious typo in values.yaml to enable resourceserver config for gateway server in helm directory. Before it leaded to changing local config of gateway server
Rollback, some unknown error appeared in gateway server keycloak configuration
Create BOM module to implement dependencies and their versions from one pom.xml file

MESSAGE.value:
TDD with CardController and refactoring
Creating CardController and CardControllerTest to get all these endpoints working properly. Also here I am updating and fixing some exception handling, services and service tests for Cards microservice.

Create LoanController and LoanControllerTest using TDD to resolve all possible issues from the start. Add some correction to the LoanDTO and using new dependency I provide @Suite to run all my tests at the same moment right before every commit.

Creating documentation for LoanController using OpenAPI and Swagger.
Commit contains many changes in documentation-related code in Loans, Cards and Accounts microservice. There were updated ErrorResponseDTOs and slightly changed controllers' documentations.

Create test suites for Accounts and Cards microservices.
Add JUnit suite dependency to the pom.xml files. So that allowed us to implement TestSuites to run all needed tests in one click
Use different profiles for different environments with help of application.yml.

Update config server and microservices to support instant updates of config files connected through GitHub. Here are implemented 2 ways: 1. Use actuator/refresh endpoint for each microservice 2. Use actuator/busrefresh endpoint that uses RabbitMQ to update all the configurations at once.

Add dependency to the config server to support /monitor endpoint that will be invoked after every push to the repo of configurations. So after each push configurations on config server will be refreshed.
Edit Docker Compose files to use different profiles. Also, make sure microservices don't start while other required services are down or unhealthy.
Create docker-compose.yml files to run Kafka and perform communication between microservices via it. All current versions are already uploaded to Docker Hub with tags `9.1-kafka` each.

Upgrade K8s deployment via helm to simplify the process
Added a Helm directory to manage the deployment of all components, including templates, environments, and services. This commit includes configurations for previously used technologies and services:
- Grafana and its components - Microservices developed in-house - Service registry and discovery service - Configuration service - Gateway service - RabbitMQ - Keycloak
External Helm implementations for third-party services are sourced from the Bitnami repository. The Helm configurations use templates to ensure abstraction and flexibility across environments.
Correct some obvious typo in values.yaml to enable resourceserver config for gateway server in helm directory. Before it leaded to changing local config of gateway server
Rollback, some unknown error appeared in gateway server keycloak configuration
Create BOM module to implement dependencies and their versions from one pom.xml file

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Create BOM module to implement dependencies and their versions from one pom.xml file
